translation.en: The following interview with the late Ruth Bader Ginsburg
translation.zh:
‎NETFLIX 纪录片系列 ‎本片中
‎已故鲁斯·巴德·金斯伯格的采访

translation.en: took place at the US Supreme Court on August 2nd, 2019.
translation.zh:
‎摄于2019年8月2日
‎地点是美国最高法院

translation.en: It had originally been scheduled a few weeks later.
translation.zh: ‎顺应鲁斯·巴德·金斯伯格的要求

translation.en: It was brought forward at her request.
translation.zh: ‎采访日提前了几个星期

translation.en: It was subsequently revealed
translation.zh: ‎后来才得知

translation.en: that a cancerous tumor had been discovered on her pancreas,
translation.zh: ‎当时肿瘤已经扩散到她的胰脏

translation.en: and three days after the interview, she began radiation therapy.
translation.zh: ‎采访结束几天后 她便开始接受化疗

translation.en: This is one of her last interviews.
translation.zh: ‎这是她生前最后的采访之一

translation.en: [Ginsburg] I had two years out of university when I was married
translation.zh: ‎从大学毕业两年后 ‎我就结婚了 我丈夫也应召入伍

translation.en: because my husband was called into service.
translation.zh: ‎我就结婚了 我丈夫也应召入伍

translation.en: And during those two years, I became pregnant.
translation.zh: ‎那两年内 我也怀孕了

translation.en: And I worried, would I be able to manage
translation.zh: ‎当时我担心自己有没有能力

translation.en: a young child and Harvard Law School?
translation.zh: ‎边抚养孩子边就读哈佛法学院

translation.en: So my husband's father said to me,
translation.zh: ‎当时我公公跟我说

translation.en: "Ruth, if you don't want to go to law school,
translation.zh: ‎“鲁斯 就算你不去哈佛法学院

translation.en: no one will think the less of you."
translation.zh: ‎也不会有人看不起你

translation.en: "You have a very good reason not to enroll."
translation.zh: ‎你有很充分的理由不去报名入学

translation.en: "But if you really want to be a lawyer,
translation.zh: ‎但如果你真想成为一名律师

translation.en: you will stop feeling sorry for yourself."
translation.zh: ‎就别再对自己感到愧疚

translation.en: "You will pick yourself up, and you will find a way."
translation.zh: ‎你要振作起来 想个出路”

translation.en: And that advice, at every turn in my life,
translation.zh: ‎那句忠告改变了我的一生

translation.en: I thought, "Do I really want this?"
translation.zh: ‎我心想：“我真要这么做吗？”

translation.en: And if the answer's "Yes," you find a way.
translation.zh: ‎如果答案是“是” 那就得想个办法

translation.en: This was inspired by Nelson Mandela.
translation.zh: ‎本片受纳尔逊·曼德拉启发

translation.en: Who once said, "What counts in life is not the mere fact that we have lived…
translation.zh:
‎他说过：“生命的意义
‎并不仅仅在于活过…

translation.en: [Meghan] …it is what difference we have made to the lives of others
translation.zh: ‎决定生命意义的是

translation.en: that will determine the significance of the life we lead."
translation.zh: ‎我们为他人的生活带来的改变”

translation.en: [Harry] His life left a lasting mark on the world.
translation.zh:
‎他的一生在世界上留下了
‎永恒不灭的历史遗迹

translation.en: A legacy that has helped inspire so many others to stand up.
translation.zh: ‎这个传承推动许多人挺身而出

translation.en: To fight for change and to become leaders.
translation.zh: ‎为改变而奋斗 成为领袖

translation.en: [Harry] So this is in memory of Madiba.
translation.zh: ‎这是纪念麦迪巴的纪录片

translation.en: [Meghan] It was made to remind us of the difference one person can make.
translation.zh:
‎本片的目的是为了提醒大家
‎我们都可以带来改变

translation.en: [Harry] It's about people who have made brave choices.
translation.zh: ‎本片讲述那些选择勇气的人

translation.en: Leaders who have walked alongside him and followed in his footsteps.
translation.zh:
‎讲述那些与他并肩同行
‎并追随他脚步的人

translation.en: [Meghan] Caring for others. Working for a better and more equal world.
translation.zh:
‎关爱他人
‎致力于打造更美好和公平的世界

translation.en: [Harry] And giving inspiration to the rest of us
translation.zh: ‎以及启发我们

translation.en: to live to lead.
translation.zh: ‎活出领导力

translation.en: ♪ You can't break me down You can't take me down ♪
translation.zh: ‎（鲁斯·巴德·金斯伯格）

translation.en: -[man 1] Are we all good to go? -[man 2] Yep.
translation.zh:
‎-可以开始了吗？
‎-可以

translation.en: -[woman] Hey, are we rolling? -[man 1] We're rolling.
translation.zh:
‎-开拍了吗？
‎-开拍了 好了

translation.en: -[woman] Okay. Justice Ginsburg-- -Yes?
translation.zh:
‎好的 ‎-金斯伯格大法官 第一镜次
‎-好的

translation.en: [woman] Take one.
translation.zh:
‎-金斯伯格大法官 第一镜次
‎-好的

translation.en: [woman] I can't imagine anyone else on Earth
translation.zh:
‎在这个世界上
‎唯有跟金斯伯格女士同处一室

translation.en: who I would be more proud to be in the room with than Ms. Ginsburg.
translation.zh: ‎能带给我最高的荣耀

translation.en: [Stephen Colbert] They call her the Notorious R.B.G.
translation.zh:
‎他们称她为
‎“声名狼藉”的金斯伯格大法官

translation.en: She's a feminist icon, and a favorite among the young people.
translation.zh:
‎她是女权主义的代表人物
‎深受年轻人欢迎

translation.en: [woman] She is the standard of courage
translation.zh: ‎她是勇气的标杆

translation.en: and intellect and kindness and heart.
translation.zh: ‎也是智慧和仁慈的标杆

translation.en: [man] Ruth used to ask,
translation.zh: ‎鲁斯问过

translation.en: "What is the difference between a bookkeeper in Brooklyn
translation.zh: ‎“布鲁克林区的簿记员

translation.en: and a Supreme Court justice?"
translation.zh: ‎跟最高法院法官有什么区别？”

translation.en: Her answer?
translation.zh: ‎她的答案是…

translation.en: "One generation."
translation.zh: ‎隔着一个时代

translation.en: It has been said that Ruth wanted to be an opera virtuoso
translation.zh:
‎有人说鲁斯原本想成为
‎一名歌剧鉴赏家

translation.en: but became a rock star instead.
translation.zh: ‎结果成了一名摇滚明星

translation.en: [Bill Clinton] Virtually every significant case brought before the Supreme Court in the decade of the '70s on behalf of women,
translation.zh:
‎在1970年代 几乎每一起
‎与女性有关的最高法院审讯案

translation.en: bore her mark.
translation.zh: ‎都有她留下的痕迹

translation.en: [man] Later, she became a star on the bench,
translation.zh: ‎后来她成为法官席上的巨星

translation.en: where she sat for 27 years.
translation.zh: ‎她坐在法官席上整整27年

translation.en: She's an amazing, brave woman. And strong.
translation.zh: ‎她是个出色、勇敢和坚强的女性

translation.en: [Ginsburg] People ask me sometimes,
translation.zh: ‎有时有人会问我

translation.en: "When will there be enough women on the court?"
translation.zh: ‎“法庭要有多少个女性才足够？”

translation.en: And my answer is,
translation.zh: ‎我的答案是

translation.en: "When there are nine."
translation.zh: ‎“九个”

translation.en: [interviewer] So much has been written and said about you,
translation.zh: ‎外间有很多关于你的文字记载和说法

translation.en: but I wonder if we could start with you telling me a little bit about your life.
translation.zh:
‎访问开始 我们想听你讲述
‎有关你人生的点点滴滴

translation.en: My current life, and for the past 26 years,
translation.zh: ‎过去26年至今

translation.en: I have been a member of the Supreme Court of the United States.
translation.zh: ‎我一直都是美国最高法院成员

translation.en: Before that, I was a lawyer and a law teacher.
translation.zh:
‎在那之前
‎我是一名律师兼法学院教授

translation.en: My entering law school class had some 500 students.
translation.zh:
‎（只是一个女孩） ‎我那届法学院入学班
‎总共有大约五百个学生

translation.en: Nine of them were women.
translation.zh: ‎其中九个是女性

translation.en: Parents of girls in those days
translation.zh: ‎在那个年代 女孩子家的父母

translation.en: thought the most important degree for their daughter
translation.zh: ‎都认为女儿们最重要的学习成就

translation.en: was not the Bachelor of Arts or Sciences.
translation.zh: ‎不是考上文学学士或理学学士

translation.en: It was the MRS degree.
translation.zh:
‎而是在高等学府中
‎找到一个出色的结婚对象

translation.en: But my mother was not that way.
translation.zh: ‎但我母亲不是那样想的

translation.en: One of the things she urged strongly
translation.zh: ‎她很强调一件事

translation.en: was that it's fine if you meet Prince Charming,
translation.zh: ‎她说如果我能找到白马王子是好事

translation.en: but always be able to fend for yourself.
translation.zh: ‎但一定要懂得自强自立

translation.en: Be independent.
translation.zh: ‎不依靠他人

translation.en: Two things were important to my mother.
translation.zh: ‎我母亲很看重两件事

translation.en: One was that I be independent,
translation.zh: ‎一是我要懂得独立

translation.en: and the other, she called it "being a lady."
translation.zh: ‎二是“要有女性气质”

translation.en: And by that, she didn't mean wearing white gloves,
translation.zh:
‎她所谓的“女性气质”
‎不是指戴着白色手套

translation.en: she meant that a lady doesn't give way
translation.zh: ‎她的意思是 身为女性

translation.en: to emotions that sap energy and do no good.
translation.zh:
‎不要向负面情绪妥协
‎不要做不公不义的事

translation.en: So anger, jealousy, remorse.
translation.zh: ‎愤怒、妒忌、怨恨

translation.en: Those were emotions that don't move you forward.
translation.zh: ‎这些情绪都不会让人进步

translation.en: They trap you.
translation.zh: ‎只会让人裹足不前

translation.en: Don't snap back in anger.
translation.zh: ‎别对愤怒做出反应

translation.en: Take a few deep breaths,
translation.zh: ‎深呼吸

translation.en: and respond in a way that you may be persuasive.
translation.zh: ‎然后以令人信服的态度回应

translation.en: It was a great sadness in my young life
translation.zh:
‎我年轻的时候
‎她在我高中毕业前一天过世

translation.en: that she died the day before I graduated from high school.
translation.zh: ‎那件事给我带来很大的伤痛

translation.en: She battled cancer for four years,
translation.zh: ‎她与癌症搏斗了四年

translation.en: and then finally succumbed.
translation.zh: ‎后来妥协了

translation.en: I decided to become a lawyer when I was a college student.
translation.zh: ‎入读大学后 我决定成为一名律师

translation.en: It was a bad time for the United States. There was a huge Red Scare.
translation.zh:
‎美国当时正处于动荡不安的年代
‎红色恐慌无所不在

translation.en: [anchor] This is no field day for Moscow or its sympathizers.
translation.zh: ‎别让莫斯科或其支持者有机可乘

translation.en: [Senator McCarthy] The only answer to a strategy of victory for the communist world
translation.zh:
‎在共产主义者的世界中
‎唯一的取胜方案

translation.en: is a strategy of victory for the free world.
translation.zh: ‎就是在自由国度中取胜

translation.en: [Ginsburg] And there was a senator from Wisconsin, Joe McCarthy,
translation.zh:
‎威斯康星州
‎有个叫乔·麦卡锡的参议员

translation.en: who saw a communist in every corner.
translation.zh: ‎他认为共产主义者无处不在

translation.en: Apparently, every time anybody says anything against anybody working for Senator McCarthy…
translation.zh: ‎每次有人针对麦卡锡议员发表异议

translation.en: -[man] Just answer the quest-- -…he's accusing them of communism.
translation.zh:
‎-回答就对了
‎-…就被他指控为共产主义支持者

translation.en: [man] Just answer the question.
translation.zh: ‎回答就对了

translation.en: People were hauled before the House Un-American Activities Committee.
translation.zh:
‎异议者在众议院
‎非美活动调查委员会前被拖走

translation.en: And my professor of constitutional law
translation.zh: ‎我的宪制性法律教授向我强调

translation.en: impressed upon me that lawyers were standing up for these people
translation.zh: ‎我的宪制性法律教授向我强调 ‎律师的职责是为异议者发声

translation.en: and reminding our Congress that we have a First Amendment
translation.zh: ‎提醒国会第一修正案的存在

translation.en: that protects our right to think, speak, and write as we believe,
translation.zh:
‎保护我们思考
‎发言和书写心中信念的权益

translation.en: and not as some Big Brother government tells us.
translation.zh: ‎而不是让独裁政府告诉我该怎么做

translation.en: [Ginsburg] That there is the right to freedom of thought and expression.
translation.zh: ‎自由思考和发表言论是我们的自由

translation.en: I said that I was exercising my rights guaranteed to me under the Fifth Amendment of the Constitution.
translation.zh:
‎我说了 我在行使
‎美国宪法第五修正案赋予的权利

translation.en: So that gave me the idea that being a lawyer was a pretty nifty thing to do.
translation.zh:
‎那一刻我意识到成为一名律师
‎是一件很了不起的事

translation.en: I thought I could earn a living, and then I could do something
translation.zh: ‎既可以挣钱谋生 ‎也可以为改善社会贡献一分力

translation.en: to make things a little better in my society.
translation.zh: ‎也可以为改善社会贡献一分力

translation.en: [Ginsburg] I didn't appreciate fully the barriers to going and getting a job in the law.
translation.zh: ‎在司法界谋职的过程让我感到很沮丧

translation.en: I did very well in law school,
translation.zh: ‎我的法学院成绩很好

translation.en: but there wasn't a single firm in the city of New York
translation.zh:
‎但当时纽约市
‎没有任何一家法律事务所

translation.en: that would offer me a job.
translation.zh: ‎愿意雇用我

translation.en: I don't know how many times I heard from law firms,
translation.zh: ‎我不知道听法律事务所说过多少遍

translation.en: "We had a lady lawyer, and she was dreadful."
translation.zh:
‎“我们雇用过一个女律师
‎她的表现糟透了”

translation.en: I had three strikes against me.
translation.zh: ‎我有三大劣势

translation.en: One is I am Jewish, and there was considerable antisemitism.
translation.zh:
‎第一 我是个犹太人
‎当时社会多少存在反犹太情绪

translation.en: The second, I was a woman, and those barriers were just beginning to fall.
translation.zh:
‎第二 我是个女人
‎就当这些阻碍渐渐消失时

translation.en: The third one was a strikeout.
translation.zh: ‎第三个打击来了 这可是重重一击

translation.en: I was a mother.
translation.zh: ‎我是个母亲

translation.en: My daughter was four years old when I graduated from law school.
translation.zh: ‎我从法学院毕业那年 我女儿才四岁

translation.en: So the rare firms that would take a chance on a woman
translation.zh: ‎已经很少法律事务所愿意录取女性了

translation.en: would not risk hiring a mother.
translation.zh: ‎更何况是冒险雇用一个当母亲的

translation.en: When the women's movement came alive in the late 1960s,
translation.zh: ‎1960年代 女权运动开始萌芽

translation.en: I knew that's what I-- I wanted.
translation.zh: ‎我知道那是我希望发生的事

translation.en: There were things that I had observed growing up.
translation.zh: ‎成长期间 我已经意识到了一些事实

translation.en: Before I became a lawyer,
translation.zh: ‎在我当上律师之前

translation.en: there was a time when women were not accepted as members of the bar.
translation.zh:
‎有一段时期
‎律师公会拒绝接收女性会员

translation.en: There were no women judges. Very few women engineers.
translation.zh: ‎当时没有女法官 也很少女性工程师

translation.en: No women police officers. No women firefighters.
translation.zh: ‎没有女警 也没有女消防员

translation.en: [news anchor] This is Mary McDonald.
translation.zh: ‎她是玛丽·麦克唐纳

translation.en: Age? Well, old enough to be the mother of those three.
translation.zh:
‎你问她几岁了？
‎年纪足以当上三个孩子的妈妈了

translation.en: Profession? That's part of it right there.
translation.zh:
‎你问她从事什么专业？
‎这就是她的专业

translation.en: Together, with a good deal of housework and lots of mileage in the family car.
translation.zh:
‎做大量的家务
‎为家庭用车贡献大量的里程

translation.en: And I thought, "Well, that's just part of the territory."
translation.zh: ‎我心想：“做这一行就是这样了

translation.en: "You have to put up with it."
translation.zh: ‎我们唯有隐忍”

translation.en: But in the late '60s, women began to think,
translation.zh:
‎可是到了1960年代后期
‎女性开始觉悟

translation.en: "No, we don't have to put up with it. We should be able to do
translation.zh:
‎“我们没必要隐忍
‎我们有权使用我们的才干

translation.en: whatever we have the talent to do,
translation.zh: ‎去做想做的事

translation.en: and no one should stop us simply because we're women."
translation.zh:
‎不能因为我们的女性身份
‎而阻挠我们”

translation.en: I was teaching law at Rutgers University,
translation.zh: ‎那年我在罗格斯大学担任法学教授

translation.en: and my students wanted to have a course on women and the law.
translation.zh:
‎我的学生们要求大学
‎开办与女性和法律相关的课程

translation.en: And in the space of a month,
translation.zh: ‎在短短一个月内

translation.en: I read every federal decision about women's rights or the lack thereof.
translation.zh:
‎我深入研究
‎联邦政府的女权政策和缺陷

translation.en: Women were making claims that they hadn't before.
translation.zh: ‎女性纷纷开始前所未有的诉求

translation.en: So I was a volunteer lawyer for the American Civil Liberties Union,
translation.zh:
‎当时我也是
‎美国公民自由联盟的志愿律师

translation.en: devoting the entire decade of the '70s to see what I could contribute.
translation.zh:
‎1970年代期间
‎我全心投入性别平权运动 ‎看看我能贡献什么

translation.en: So in that decade of the '70s,
translation.zh: ‎于是1970年代期间

translation.en: I appeared before many courts. This court included.
translation.zh:
‎很多法庭上都能看见我的身影
‎包括这个法庭

translation.en: When I first got into the business of gender equality,
translation.zh: ‎刚加入平权运动时

translation.en: it was a world in which most men thought,
translation.zh: ‎大多数男性都认为

translation.en: "There really is no such thing as discrimination against women."
translation.zh: ‎女性没有遭受到歧视

translation.en: All the barriers were regarded as protections.
translation.zh:
‎女性面对的社会障碍
‎都被他们视为保护措施

translation.en: [Ginsburg on old recording] They exclude women from an occupation thought more appropriate to men.
translation.zh:
‎他们不让女性从事
‎他们认为更适合男性的职业

translation.en: The sex criterion stigmatizes when it is used to limit hours of work for women only.
translation.zh:
‎如果性别分类被用来限制女性工时
‎那就是一种侮辱

translation.en: Hours regulations, today, "protect" women
translation.zh: ‎当代工时制度是用来避免女性

translation.en: from competing for extra remuneration, higher-paying jobs, promotions.
translation.zh:
‎去争取更高的薪酬
‎更高薪的工作和升迁机会

translation.en: People knew that race discrimination was odious.
translation.zh: ‎人们都鄙视种族主义

translation.en: Discrimination based on religion was a bad thing.
translation.zh: ‎人们都认为歧视他人宗教是错的

translation.en: But they didn't think that about the barriers that women face.
translation.zh:
‎但从来没人意识到
‎为女性设立障碍也是错的

translation.en: There's a line of contention that…
translation.zh: ‎有个争议点是…

translation.en: more protections are necessary for women.
translation.zh: ‎女性需要更多保护

translation.en: From bans on pornography to child-rearing benefits for mothers
translation.zh:
‎例如禁止接触色情制品
‎为女性提供育儿保障

translation.en: but not for fathers, not equally for fathers.
translation.zh:
‎为人父者没有这些福利
‎当爸爸的没有这种待遇

translation.en: Uh, the greater protection that women need from
translation.zh: ‎女性需要更多保护…

translation.en: child sexual molestation,
translation.zh: ‎避免她们成为儿童性骚扰受害者

translation.en: where they are more frequently the victims,
translation.zh: ‎毕竟大部分受害者都是女性

translation.en: and I'd be interested in your thinking as to the use of the legislative branch
translation.zh:
‎我想理解你决定
‎从法治角度切入这项议题的原因

translation.en: as some of the other women's advocates have articulated the views in the 1980s.
translation.zh:
‎毕竟在1980年代
‎有些女性代表已经表达了她们的立场

translation.en: I think it's grand to use the legislative branch.
translation.zh: ‎我认为从法治角度切入是一项创举

translation.en: What you discuss, Senator Specter, I think reflects a large generational difference.
translation.zh:
‎斯佩克特议员
‎你的论点反映出一个巨大的代沟

translation.en: In the days of the protective laws,
translation.zh: ‎在保护性法律当道的年代

translation.en: the legislative branch was used extensively.
translation.zh: ‎法治是常见手段

translation.en: And the legislative branch said that we'll restrict the hours
translation.zh: ‎法治限制女性工时

translation.en: for women but not for men.
translation.zh: ‎却没限制男性工时

translation.en: We will restrict night work for women but not for men.
translation.zh:
‎禁止女性上夜班
‎却没禁止男性上夜班

translation.en: We will restrict the jobs that women can take but not men.
translation.zh:
‎限制女性从事的行业
‎却没限制男性从事的行业

translation.en: Because we know better, we can protect them.
translation.zh:
‎就因为我们自以为懂很多
‎自以为可以保护她们

translation.en: They need to be protected from unhealthy and unsafe conditions.
translation.zh:
‎断定她们必须远离
‎不健康和不安全的环境

translation.en: Especially jobs that pay double time, um, and the like.
translation.zh: ‎远离薪酬双倍的职业 以此类推

translation.en: The legislature works all over the place protecting women.
translation.zh: ‎全国各地的法律体系都旨在保护女性

translation.en: They thought they operated benignly in the women's favor.
translation.zh: ‎他们以为这是为女性着想

translation.en: And another one, women didn't serve on juries
translation.zh: ‎却不让女性成为陪审团成员

translation.en: because they were considered the center of home and family life.
translation.zh: ‎就因为她们被视为家的核心

translation.en: What that says to a woman is, "You're not really a full citizen."
translation.zh:
‎其实这等于是对女性说：
‎“你们没有正式公民权”

translation.en: Citizens have obligations, as well as rights.
translation.zh: ‎公民有义务 也能行使权利

translation.en: My generation had the sense that
translation.zh: ‎我这一代人意识到

translation.en: that protection was protecting men's jobs against…
translation.zh: ‎这种“保护”旨在避免女性

translation.en: from women's competition.
translation.zh: ‎跟男性竞争他们所从事的工作

translation.en: [Ginsburg in interview] I knew what I was doing was important and that I had to make people understand.
translation.zh:
‎我知道我所做的事很重要
‎我必须让人理解

translation.en: Supreme Court Justice Brennan put it very well.
translation.zh: ‎最高法院大法官布伦南说得很好

translation.en: The woman was not on a pedestal.
translation.zh: ‎他说女性并没有站在高台上

translation.en: She was, in fact, in a cage.
translation.zh: ‎而是被关在牢笼里

translation.en: And on the other side, there were several cases in which I represented men.
translation.zh:
‎另一边厢
‎我也担任过几名男性的代表律师

translation.en: One of my favorite clients, his wife died in childbirth,
translation.zh:
‎我有个令我印象深刻的客户
‎他的妻子难产而死

translation.en: and he was left the sole surviving parent.
translation.zh: ‎他成了单亲爸爸

translation.en: There were childcare benefits if a male worker dies,
translation.zh:
‎如果男性职员过世
‎政府就会为育儿补贴

translation.en: but if a female worker died,
translation.zh: ‎但换成女性职员过世

translation.en: there were no childcare benefits for the widower.
translation.zh: ‎丧偶的丈夫却得不到育儿补贴

translation.en: [Ginsburg on old recording] The underlying assumption was, "Wives are typically dependent, husbands are not."
translation.zh:
‎我们基本假定：
‎“妻子经济上依赖配偶 丈夫则不然”

translation.en: The impact is to encourage the traditional division of labor between man and woman.
translation.zh: ‎这个假定扩大了劳动市场的性别差异

translation.en: [Ginsburg in interview] We were trying to change that way of thinking.
translation.zh: ‎我们设法改变他人的思想

translation.en: So that men, if they were parents,
translation.zh: ‎如此一来 扮演家长角色的男性

translation.en: would have the same benefits as women.
translation.zh: ‎也能享有女性家长的福利

translation.en: And women who wanted to be whatever,
translation.zh: ‎女性也能从事任何行业

translation.en: a doctor or a lawyer, police officer,
translation.zh: ‎想当医生、律师或警察

translation.en: that would be fine.
translation.zh: ‎都没问题

translation.en: Virtually every significant case brought before the Supreme Court in the decade of the '70s on behalf of women,
translation.zh:
‎在1970年代 几乎每一起
‎与女性有关的最高法院审讯案

translation.en: bore her mark.
translation.zh: ‎都有她留下的痕迹

translation.en: Wanting what seems now to be such a terribly simple principle,
translation.zh:
‎她当初提出的诉求
‎在这个时代是再正常不过的原则

translation.en: equal treatment for women and men before the law.
translation.zh: ‎也就是追求体现性别平等的法律体制

translation.en: [interviewer] A principle that was always embraced by your husband, Marty.
translation.zh: ‎这是你丈夫马丁一直秉持的原则

translation.en: In every way.
translation.zh: ‎他在各方面都秉持着这个原则

translation.en: I have had the great, good fortune to share life with a partner
translation.zh: ‎能跟我的伴侣一起生活是我一大福气

translation.en: truly extraordinary for his generation.
translation.zh: ‎他是那一代的佼佼者

translation.en: A man who believed at age 18, when we met,
translation.zh:
‎我18岁认识这个男人那年
‎他就秉持着一个信念

translation.en: and who believes today…
translation.zh: ‎他相信 这个年代…

translation.en: that a woman's work…
translation.zh: ‎女性的付出

translation.en: whether at home or on the job,
translation.zh: ‎无论是在家里 或是在职场上

translation.en: is as important as a man's.
translation.zh: ‎其分量都跟男性一样

translation.en: I became a lawyer
translation.zh: ‎我当上律师时

translation.en: in days when women were not wanted by most members of the legal profession.
translation.zh: ‎司法界并不欢迎女性加入

translation.en: I became a lawyer because Marty, and his parents,
translation.zh:
‎我能当上律师
‎都要感谢马丁和他的父母

translation.en: supported that choice unreservedly.
translation.zh: ‎他们毫无保留地支持我的决定

translation.en: [Ginsburg in interview] He was always my biggest booster,
translation.zh: ‎他是我最大的动力

translation.en: and he was tireless in his effort to see
translation.zh: ‎他竭尽全力地付出

translation.en: that I would be the nominee.
translation.zh: ‎只望看到我获提名为大法官

translation.en: He also had a particular skill. He was a great cook.
translation.zh:
‎他也有一个特别的本领
‎那就是他厨艺精湛

translation.en: Our arrangement was, when my children were young,
translation.zh: ‎我们当时的安排是 孩子们还小时

translation.en: I was the everyday cook, he was the weekend and company cook.
translation.zh: ‎我负责每天下厨 他则负责周末下厨

translation.en: My daughter, in her teens,
translation.zh: ‎我女儿进入青春期后

translation.en: noticed the enormous difference between Daddy's cooking and Mommy's.
translation.zh: ‎发现爸爸妈妈的厨艺差距很大

translation.en: And decided Daddy shouldn't be just the weekend cook,
translation.zh: ‎认为爸爸不应该只负责在周末下厨

translation.en: he should be the everyday cook.
translation.zh: ‎他应该每天都下厨

translation.en: So for all the years that I've lived in Washington, DC,
translation.zh: ‎住在华盛顿特区那些年

translation.en: I've not cooked a meal.
translation.zh: ‎我从来没下厨过

translation.en: There is one in this audience whose presence I want specially to acknowledge.
translation.zh: ‎我要特别感谢观众席中其中一个人

translation.en: She is my wonderful mother-in-law, Evelyn Ginsburg.
translation.zh:
‎她就是我无与伦比的婆婆
‎伊夫琳·金斯伯格

translation.en: My mother-in-law, on my wedding day, gave me the best advice ever.
translation.zh:
‎我结婚那天
‎我婆婆跟我说了一句最有用的忠告

translation.en: She said, "Dear, I would like to tell you the secret of a happy marriage."
translation.zh:
‎她说：“我要告诉你
‎维持美好婚姻的秘诀”

translation.en: "Well, I'd be glad to have it. What is it?"
translation.zh:
‎我说：“我也很想知道
‎秘诀是什么？”

translation.en: She said, "Sometimes, it helps to be a little… deaf."
translation.zh: ‎她回答：“有时装聋是好事”

translation.en: That is, if an unkind word is spoken, you tune out.
translation.zh:
‎意思是 如果有人对你说难听的话
‎你就装作没听见

translation.en: And I have followed that advice assiduously.
translation.zh: ‎这句忠告我奉行到底

translation.en: Not only in dealing with my dear spouse but with my colleagues.
translation.zh:
‎面对我亲爱的丈夫 我秉持这句忠告
‎面对同事也是

translation.en: [interviewer] What do you think the world needs more of at this moment?
translation.zh: ‎你认为眼下这个世界更需要什么？

translation.en: Um. If I could pick one word, it would be "listening."
translation.zh:
‎如果要我选一个词
‎我会选“聆听”这个词

translation.en: I think,
translation.zh: ‎我认为…

translation.en: today, people tend to talk only to like-minded people.
translation.zh:
‎这年头人们倾向于
‎只跟想法雷同的人来往

translation.en: I think the social media intensifies that.
translation.zh: ‎社交媒体也强化了这点

translation.en: One of the things that has made America great
translation.zh: ‎但美国强大的一大基础

translation.en: is that we have such a diverse population.
translation.zh: ‎是人口多元化

translation.en: So many different backgrounds, racial and national origins.
translation.zh: ‎国民来自各种背景、种族和血统

translation.en: And the ability to not just tolerate
translation.zh: ‎不仅互相包容

translation.en: but even applaud our differences and yet come together.
translation.zh: ‎也欣赏彼此的不同 共生共存

translation.en: When once asked, how we could be friends given our disagreement on lots of things,
translation.zh:
‎（2016年于安东宁·斯卡利亚大法官
‎追悼会上致悼词） ‎有次被问及要如何求同存异

translation.en: Justice Scalia answered, "I attack ideas. I don't attack people."
translation.zh:
‎安东宁·斯卡利亚大法官回答：
‎“我针对的是想法 不是人”

translation.en: "Some very good people have some very bad ideas."
translation.zh: ‎有些很好的人秉持着很坏的想法”

translation.en: The motto of the United States is, "E pluribus unum."
translation.zh: ‎美国的国箴是“E Pluribus Unum”

translation.en: "Of many, one."
translation.zh: ‎意思是“合众为一”

translation.en: And that's, with all our diversity… Yet, we are one nation,
translation.zh:
‎尽管种族群体多元化
‎但依然萃于一国

translation.en: with a democracy I hope we can keep.
translation.zh:
‎并秉持着
‎我希望能保存下去的民主精神

translation.en: I would say that we are not experiencing the best of times.
translation.zh: ‎虽然这不是最美好的年代

translation.en: Our legislature, which is the first branch of government,
translation.zh: ‎法治是政府的首要机构

translation.en: is, right now, not functioning.
translation.zh: ‎如今却无法发挥作用

translation.en: But I can think back to 1993.
translation.zh: ‎但回顾1993年

translation.en: The year that President Clinton nominated me for a vacancy on the Supreme Court.
translation.zh:
‎也就是我获克林顿总统
‎提名为最高法院大法官那年

translation.en: I had spent ten years of my life litigating gender discrimination cases,
translation.zh:
‎当时我已经用了十年的岁月
‎将性别歧视案诉诸法律

translation.en: I was one of four general counsel to the American Civil Liberties Union,
translation.zh:
‎我也是美国公民自由联盟
‎四大首席法律顾问之一

translation.en: and yet the vote to confirm me was 96 to 3.
translation.zh: ‎结果以93比3压倒性多数票获选

translation.en: That kind of rapport doesn't exist now.
translation.zh: ‎这种共通性是前所未见的

translation.en: But my dream is that we will get back to it.
translation.zh: ‎我的梦想是我们能够回到那个初衷

translation.en: One day, I think it will take strong people on…
translation.zh:
‎我相信总有一天
‎两大党派会有内心强大的人

translation.en: from both parties, to say,
translation.zh:
‎我相信总有一天
‎两大党派会有内心强大的人 ‎站出来说：
‎“让我们一起来为国家的福祉努力”

translation.en: "Let's get together and work for the good of the country."
translation.zh:
‎站出来说：
‎“让我们一起来为国家的福祉努力”

translation.en: It was a great man once said,
translation.zh: ‎有个伟人说过

translation.en: that the true symbol of the United States is not the bald eagle,
translation.zh: ‎美国真正的象征不是白头海雕

translation.en: it is the pendulum.
translation.zh: ‎而是司法钟摆

translation.en: And when the pendulum swings too far in one direction, it will go back.
translation.zh:
‎当这个钟摆往某个方向摆得太远时
‎就会回到原点

translation.en: Some terrible things have happened in the United States,
translation.zh: ‎美国发生了不少可怕的事

translation.en: but one can only hope that we learn.
translation.zh: ‎我们只能希望人们能从中学习

translation.en: [interviewer] Have there been moments that have especially challenged you?
translation.zh: ‎你有没有碰过难以克服的挑战？

translation.en: Well, I'd say the biggest challenge for me…
translation.zh: ‎我认为我最大的挑战…

translation.en: uh, was…
ten years ago when my husband died.
translation.zh: ‎十年前 我丈夫的离世

translation.en: He was, as I said, my biggest booster, my biggest supporter.
translation.zh:
‎我说过他是我最大的动力
‎我最有力的支持者

translation.en: He was the first boy I ever knew who cared that I had a brain.
translation.zh:
‎我认识的男生中
‎他是第一个在乎我有没有脑袋的人

translation.en: He never regarded me as any kind of a threat or competition,
translation.zh: ‎他从来没把我看成威胁或竞争对手

translation.en: just the opposite.
translation.zh: ‎反而对我很好

translation.en: I think he believed that because he wanted to spend the rest of his life with me,
translation.zh:
‎我认为那是因为
‎他相信如果他想与我共度余生

translation.en: I had to be something really special.
translation.zh: ‎那我就要是个出类拔萃的人

translation.en: Well, I feel his loss…
translation.zh: ‎我天天都感受到…

translation.en: every day.
translation.zh: ‎他不在了

translation.en: But I think he would be pleased…
translation.zh: ‎但我相信他会为我所做的一切…

translation.en: about what I am doing.
translation.zh: ‎感到高兴

translation.en: [interviewer] What do you think has really mattered most to you during the course of your life?
translation.zh: ‎影响你人生最大的事是什么？

translation.en: That I had the opportunity to help a movement for change.
translation.zh:
‎我有机会推动某个社会运动
‎带来改变

translation.en: Change so that daughters would be cherished as much as sons.
translation.zh: ‎让女孩和男孩一样受到重视

translation.en: There should be no spaces where women can't enter,
translation.zh:
‎世界上不应该存在
‎女性无法涉足的空间

translation.en: as there were many in my growing up years.
translation.zh:
‎毕竟在我成长期间
‎存在不少女性无法涉足的空间

translation.en: Those barriers are now, thank goodness, gone.
translation.zh: ‎好在那些阻碍已经不见了

translation.en: You need two things, talent and hard work to go with it.
translation.zh:
‎我们只需要才能和努力
‎这两大元素来追求成就

translation.en: But there should not be any artificial barriers holding you back.
translation.zh: ‎但我们不应该受到任何人为障碍牵制

translation.en: Indeed, in my lifetime,
translation.zh: ‎说真的 我希望有生之年

translation.en: I expect to see three, four, perhaps even more women,
translation.zh: ‎能看到三四个 甚至更多个女性

translation.en: on the high court bench.
translation.zh: ‎坐在最高法院法官席上

translation.en: Women not shaped from the same mold but of different complexions.
translation.zh:
‎而且这些女性来自不同背景
‎拥有不同肤色

translation.en: We've advanced a long way, but there's still a long way to go.
translation.zh:
‎我们进步很多了
‎但还有很长的路要走

translation.en: [interviewer] Is there any advice you would give for young prospective leaders
translation.zh:
‎对于在平权问题严重的国家服务
‎年轻有为的领导人

translation.en: in those parts of the world where gender equality is still a big issue?
translation.zh: ‎你有什么话想说吗？

translation.en: Uh, if you want your country
translation.zh: ‎如果你们希望国家兴旺

translation.en: to succeed, you should put your money
translation.zh: ‎如果你们希望国家兴旺 ‎那就应该投资在女性身上

translation.en: with the women.
translation.zh: ‎那就应该投资在女性身上

translation.en: That's my dream for the world.
translation.zh: ‎这是我对这个世界的梦想

translation.en: I'm convinced we will all be better off for it,
translation.zh: ‎我相信如果男女同心协力

translation.en: if women and men are true partners.
translation.zh: ‎国家就会变得更美好

translation.en: [Ginsburg in old interview] I think the-- At least the young people that I see, think of Malala--
translation.zh:
‎起码我看到了一些年轻女性崛起
‎例如马拉拉

translation.en: [woman] Malala Yousafzai?
translation.zh: ‎马拉拉·优素福扎伊

translation.en: And we should all fight for our rights, for the rights of children,
translation.zh: ‎我们应该为自己争取权益 ‎为儿童争取权益 为女性争取权益

translation.en: for the rights of women and for the rights of every human being.
translation.zh: ‎为儿童争取权益 为女性争取权益 ‎为全人类争取权益

translation.en: -[Ginsburg] The Swedish Greta-- -[woman] Greta Thunberg. Yep. [Ginsburg] Yep.
translation.zh:
‎-瑞典人格蕾塔·通贝里
‎-格蕾塔·通贝里 没错

translation.en: You have not seen the last of us, we can assure you that.
translation.zh:
‎我敢向你们担保
‎我们不是最后一群示威者

translation.en: [Ginsburg] The young people that I see are fired up…
translation.zh: ‎我看到的年轻人都充满力量

translation.en: …and they want our country to be what it should be.
translation.zh: ‎他们希望国家往正确的方向发展

translation.en: [interviewer] If you could talk to your younger self, what advice would you give her?
translation.zh: ‎你会想对年轻时的自己说什么？

translation.en: [Ginsburg] The first advice I would give to a girl just like me
translation.zh: ‎我给女孩最重要的忠告是

translation.en: would be, "Go for it."
translation.zh: ‎我给女孩最重要的忠告是 ‎“想做就去做

translation.en: "You can make your dreams come true if you're willing to put in the hard work."
translation.zh: ‎只要愿意努力 梦想就会成真”

translation.en: For a boy, I would say,
translation.zh: ‎我会对男孩说

translation.en: "Don't miss out on the joys and the burdens of raising your children."
translation.zh: ‎“别错过养育孩子的喜悦和重担”

translation.en: And, then, something else I would say…
translation.zh: ‎我还有一句话想说

translation.en: "Always do something outside yourself."
translation.zh: ‎我们要一直做舒适圈以外的事

translation.en: ♪ Sisters, let's go down Let's go down, come on down ♪
translation.zh: ‎姐妹们 都过来 一起走下来 走近来

translation.en: [Ginsburg] You're a member of a community.
translation.zh: ‎你们是社区一员

translation.en: You are blessed with having certain talents.
translation.zh: ‎你们拥有某种才能

translation.en: You should use your education and your talent
translation.zh:
‎你们应该使用
‎所受过的教育和所拥有的才能

translation.en: to help make things a little better for people who are not as fortunate
translation.zh: ‎为比你们不幸的人…

translation.en: as you are.
translation.zh: ‎尽一分力

translation.en: [woman] To be born into a world that does not see you,
translation.zh: ‎出生在一个无视你的世界里

translation.en: that does not believe in your potential,
translation.zh: ‎一个不相信你有潜质的世界里

translation.en: that does not give you a path for opportunity
translation.zh: ‎一个不给你机会的世界里

translation.en: or a clear path for education.
translation.zh: ‎一个不给你明确教育方向的世界里

translation.en: And despite this, to be able to see beyond the world you are in,
translation.zh: ‎你仍能看透这个世界

translation.en: to imagine that something can be different.
translation.zh: ‎想象出另一种可能性

translation.en: That is the job of a prophet.
translation.zh: ‎这是先知的职责

translation.en: And it is the rare prophet who not only imagines a new world,
translation.zh:
‎这个难得一见的先知
‎不仅预想出一个新世界

translation.en: but also makes that new world a reality in her lifetime.
translation.zh: ‎还在有生之年实现这个新世界

translation.en: This was the brilliance and vision of Justice Ruth Bader Ginsburg.
translation.zh:
‎这是鲁斯·巴德·金斯伯格大法官
‎生前的伟绩和愿景

translation.en: This was Justice Ginsburg's life's work.
translation.zh: ‎这是金斯伯格大法官毕生的使命

translation.en: To insist that the Constitution deliver on its promise.
translation.zh: ‎坚持通过宪法来兑现承诺

translation.en: That "we the people" would include all the people.
translation.zh: ‎坚持所谓“人民”就是所有人的理念

translation.en: She carried out that work in every chapter of her life.
translation.zh:
‎她在人生每个篇章中
‎都致力于实现这个使命

translation.en: As an advocate arguing six times before this court
translation.zh: ‎她在这个法院前

translation.en: for equal treatment for women and men.
translation.zh: ‎为男女平权申辩过六次

translation.en: As a judge on the DC circuit, and as a justice on this court.
translation.zh:
‎身为华盛顿特区巡回上诉法院法官
‎兼最高法院大法官

translation.en: And as a path-marking role model to women and girls of all ages,
translation.zh: ‎以及各年龄阶层女性的开路楷模

translation.en: who now know that no office is out of reach for their dreams.
translation.zh:
‎你让她们知道没有任何政府机关
‎能阻挠她们追求梦想

translation.en: Nothing could stop Justice Ginsburg's unflagging devotion to this project.
translation.zh:
‎没有什么能撼动金斯伯格大法官
‎对这个项目的不懈坚持

translation.en: Not even cancer.
translation.zh: ‎就连癌症也不能

translation.en: Justice Ginsburg,
translation.zh: ‎金斯伯格大法官

translation.en: from generation to generation,
translation.zh: ‎我们答应你

translation.en: we promise to carry forward your legacy.
translation.zh: ‎世世代代 都会延续你的传承
